verses.plain: My brethren, have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Lord of glory, with respect of persons.

tokens.t: My brethren, have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ,
of glory, with respect of persons.

verses.plain: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring, in goodly apparel, and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment;

tokens.t: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring, in goodly apparel, and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment;

verses.plain: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing, and say unto him, Sit thou here in a good place; and say to the poor, Stand thou there, or sit here under my footstool:

tokens.t: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing, and say unto him, Sit thou here in a good place; and say to the poor, Stand thou there, or sit here under my footstool:

verses.plain: Are ye not then partial in yourselves, and are become judges of evil thoughts?

tokens.t: Are ye not then partial in yourselves, and are become judges of evil thoughts?

verses.plain: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?

tokens.t: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?

verses.plain: But ye have despised the poor. Do not rich men oppress you, and draw you before the judgment seats?

tokens.t: But ye have despised the poor. Do not rich men oppress you, and draw you before the judgment seats?

verses.plain: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called?

tokens.t: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called?

verses.plain: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself, ye do well:

tokens.t: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself, ye do well:

verses.plain: But if ye have respect to persons, ye commit sin, and are convinced of the law as transgressors.

tokens.t: But if ye have respect to persons, ye commit sin, and are convinced of the law as transgressors.

verses.plain: For whosoever shall keep the whole law, and yet offend in one point, he is guilty of all.

tokens.t: For whosoever shall keep the whole law, and yet offend in one
, he is guilty of all.

verses.plain: For he that said, Do not commit adultery, said also, Do not kill. Now if thou commit no adultery, yet if thou kill, thou art become a transgressor of the law.

tokens.t: For he that said, Do not commit adultery, said also, Do not kill. Now if thou commit no adultery, yet if thou kill, thou art become a transgressor of the law.

verses.plain: So speak ye, and so do, as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty.

tokens.t: So speak ye, and so do, as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty.

verses.plain: For he shall have judgment without mercy, that hath shewed no mercy; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment.

tokens.t: For he shall have judgment without mercy, that hath shewed no mercy; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment.

verses.plain: What doth it profit, my brethren, though a man say he hath faith, and have not works? can faith save him?

tokens.t: What
profit, my brethren, though a man say he hath faith, and have not works? can faith save him?

verses.plain: If a brother or sister be naked, and destitute of daily food,

tokens.t: If a brother or sister be naked, and destitute of daily food,

verses.plain: And one of you say unto them, Depart in peace, be ye warmed and filled; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body; what doth it profit?

tokens.t: And one of you say unto them, Depart in peace, be
warmed and filled; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body; what
profit?

verses.plain: Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.

tokens.t: Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.

verses.plain: Yea, a man may say, Thou hast faith, and I have works: shew me thy faith without thy works, and I will shew thee my faith by my works.

tokens.t: Yea, a man may say, Thou hast faith, and I have works: shew me thy faith without thy works, and I will shew thee my faith by my works.

verses.plain: Thou believest that there is one God; thou doest well: the devils also believe, and tremble.

tokens.t: Thou believest that there is one God; thou doest well: the devils also believe, and tremble.

verses.plain: But wilt thou know, O vain man, that faith without works is dead?

tokens.t: But wilt thou know, O vain man, that faith without works is dead?

verses.plain: Was not Abraham our father justified by works, when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar?

tokens.t: Was not Abraham our father justified by works, when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar?

verses.plain: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works, and by works was faith made perfect?

tokens.t: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works, and by works was faith made perfect?

verses.plain: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith, Abraham believed God, and it was imputed unto him for righteousness: and he was called the Friend of God.

tokens.t: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith, Abraham believed God, and it was imputed unto him for righteousness: and he was called the Friend of God.

verses.plain: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified, and not by faith only.

tokens.t: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified, and not by faith only.

verses.plain: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works, when she had received the messengers, and had sent them out another way?

tokens.t: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works, when she had received the messengers, and had sent
out another way?

verses.plain: For as the body without the spirit is dead, so faith without works is dead also.

tokens.t: For as the body without the spirit is dead, so faith without works is dead also.
